column5: i'm wondering if anyone in the group lives in a state or district, who has used one of these alternatives. and if so, if they could speak with us about how they think that went,
we've we've never used any of these systems, but

i live in georgia, and i can kind of, we recently had a herschel walker versus professional warnock, and that only went to one run off, but just that one run off kind of really showed how how sick of of the election stuff people get, because people really,

you really have to drag people to go back and do the second time just for that one. so i kind of wonder if people would be willing to put up with something, a little more complicated compared to that.

well, i will say, i think, if you're using rank choice voting. i think the idea of using the instant runoff swear, like they just automatically calculate it, instead of having to go back into voting is better because like you said that people don't want to go back in to vote again. so, if you're going to use this system, i think you've got to do it to where it's the instant runoff stuff, where they're automatically calculating it by eliminating people and just reach out.
